name: Echoes from Afar
description:
Made in 48hs for Winter Jam 2022 with the theme Language.

In Echoes from Afar, you journey through unexplored lands while mimicking the sounds you encounter.
Collect runes and combine them in order to interact with the events in your path.

Use your runes wisely and make it to the end of the Journey! 

Made by Vincent Silva & Joaquin Volonte
BGM by nojisuma
